title: Treat files in .git/info/exclude as ignored
body:
.git/info/exclude has equivalent syntax to .gitignore, for the purpose
of placing ignored files that are local to the current clone. This
change adds support for this file as if it were a regular .gitignore.

Signed-off-by: Ryan Gonzalez <rymg19@gmail.com>

title: Substituted space for spurious nbsp in comment
Issue #535 program not found on windows
body:
Added a cfg for windows for the following commands
* mkdir
* cp
* mv
* rm

Tested on Windows 11

The flags that are passed to the respective windows commands are open do discussion as I am not sure if they behave the same like in unix.

title: feat: replaced all the name records in the icon font from `Untitled1` to `Broot Icons Visual Studio Code`
body:
I used *FontForge* to do this. Replaced all `Untitled1` to `Broot Icons Visual Studio Code` in `vscode.ttx`.

Copy of https://github.com/Canop/broot/pull/525 with a better branch name.

title: Update broot.vim link
body:
The author has moved development to GitHub. See:

https://github.com/lstwn/broot.vim/pull/1

title: fix formatting of default config file
body: There was a lot of mixed hard and soft tabs, inconsistent tab widths, and incorrect indentation

title: Fix typos
Vim mode docs: Repair <code> formatting
Add Gentoo Linux installation instructions
body:
Broot is available in Gentoo Linux: https://packages.gentoo.org/packages/app-misc/broot

Add it to the list of distro installation instructions.

title: Fix a wrong path, some typos and indentation
body:
## Website

### Tricks section

* Fix path: `~/config/select.toml` → `~/config/broot/select.toml`. The latter is used later for creating an alias.

### Navigation section

* Change ` q` to `space` `q` because the the whitespace before `q` does get rendered.

### Various places

* Fix some typos

## resources

* `default-conf.hjson` uses tabs for indentation. Some lines in between are indented with spaces. → Changed to tabs.

title: Add dependabot config for cargo updates
body:
Creates update PRs similar to https://github.com/dbast/broot/pulls with history for each dependency bump etc for review.

PRs can be merged if CI is green or closed to ignore the dependency regarding auto updates.

title: Document alt+enter keybinding fix for Windows Terminal
body: [As requested](https://github.com/Canop/broot/issues/50#issuecomment-890290701), I'm documenting how to fix Broot's `alt+enter` keyboard shortcut in Windows Terminal (which binds `alt+enter` to "Toggle Fullscreen" by default).

title: Document the --color option
body: I've simply added the `--color` option to the `man` page, whilst removing `--no-style`, which was seemingly removed sometime between 93b1ffcc701a7753e8376c80b0c10683f7e3e36d and 7d512894808500946a6acb6d4939d4ba1473c14d.

title: Fix building error on FreeBSD host
Solarized light: Better preview window colors and syntax theme.
add solarized theme to doc.
Fix broken links for https://dystroy.org/broot
Refactor bash shell function to avoid usage of sub-shell
body:
Additionally, this contains proposed changes from #118
- use local variables to prevent accidental overwriting of variables set by the user in the current shell
- rename variables to a more descriptive name

Closes #118

title: Fix typos
add colored help
body:
Thank you for maintaining this awesome tool in advance.

Lots of cli tools written in rust have a colored help (fd, bat etc.). I think adding this tiny feature to `broot` is not a bad idea :)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6105425/111727113-3c71bb80-88a5-11eb-9389-044cd2d2f7b0.png)


( I noticed that `default-features` for clap are disabled in the `Cargo.toml`. Since the `color` feature is one of them I don't know if it was intentional disabled. )

title: Fix cargo test on windows, make the test OS agnostic
Add PowerShell UTF-8 encoding on common-problem site web page
Closes #351
fish completion for br
body:
make `br` inherit completion of `broot`

https://fishshell.com/docs/current/cmds/function.html
> `-w WRAPPED_COMMAND` or `--wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND` causes the function to inherit completions from the given wrapped command.

https://github.com/Canop/broot/issues/337

title: website - add info on installing with MacPorts
ask for log on bug report
body: This PR improves the bug_report template to add information on how to get the log of br (copied from https://dystroy.org/broot/community/#log)

title: Docs: Vim integration plugin
body:
Hey,

first of all thanks for making this awesome piece of software! 

Since I found no integration plugin for vim, I created a small one. To help people looking for vim integration as well, I added a reference to the plugin in the tips and tricks section of the docs on the website.

PS: Super sweet that one can join multiple configuration files for broot via the command line flag. However, this info was hidden in the help section and not mentioned elsewhere. However, it is massively useful for integrations like this (I used that feature to append "enter on a file prints the path behavior" to the default configuration). It might be worth pointing that out in the launch section of the docs (next to --out and the likes). Let me know, if I can help..
